pullrequest.title: Support only standard CMAKE format for BUILD_TYPES

content.raw:
Note that we are currently supporting several formats for build types, ie: Debug and DEBUG. I'm planning on another pull request which use this variable to pull googe-perf dependency check when Profile mode is enabled. I need to change the order of calling SearchForStuff.cmake and change the STREQUAL check there by BUILD_TYPE_PROFILE variable, which saves duplicate code.

Once we change to only support the standard build types, then I see no reason to keep this variables defined, a single STREQUAL should be enough.
